102-3 Location of headquarters  XP Inc. is incorporated in the Cayman Islands and is listed on Nasdaq  in the USA. Our head 
office is located in Rio de Janeiro and our main office, which includes most of our 
operations, is located in São Paulo.   
102-4 Location of operations  Our main operation is located in Brazil, but XP Inc. has operations around the world, with 
offices in New York, Miami, London, Lisbon, and Geneva.  
As a consequence of the COVID -19 pandemic, most of our employees are working remotely. 
Based on comprehensive assessments of the well -being  and performance of our workforce, 
on September 11, 2020, our Management announced the permanent company -wide adoption 
of the home office model.   
102-5 Ownership and legal form  XP Inc. is a publicly traded S.A. company, listed on Nasdaq.
